flawed_nl_solution:
This year, Kyle was only able to pick 12/2 = <<12/2=6>>6 roses.
He wants to give his mother 12 x 2 = <<12*2=24>>24 roses.
He still needs another 24 - 6 = <<24-6=22>>22 roses.
He would have to spend 22 x 3 = $<<22*3=66>>66.
#### 66

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 22. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
